channel.title: Wilderness ! Skulling!
channel.description:
Hi , im just exploring my server to see what it has and i went to the agility place at the back of the wildy, went down a ladder i'd found and instead of in the bottom right corner, it says Valentine with a skull above it, it said (once i was down the ladder) Level: 56 and went down to 55 as i went south etc. I was wondering how i could have it like that for all the wildy, and also if its even possible to 'Skull' when you attack someone and it goes off when you log out.
AND, how do i make safe zones , because i have volcomscape and its pking around varrock but i want it to be safe everywhere apart from the actual wildy, and i want a command to take you to edge where you can realistic pk :)
Thanks! -- Val.

item.title: Wilderness ! Skulling!
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

Rudolph:

Just download a source with it already and get the coding

Gimme a example of a source that has it?

Read full topic
